category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_staging_directory_folder_naming_pattern
preference.preference_description: Specifies folder naming pattern for user staging and shared staging directory to be used by simulation process management for Unix and Windows platform. The pattern can be specified as a combination of fixed strings in double quotes and keywords. The supported keywords are ITEMID, REVID, ITEMREVID, ITEMREVNAME, REVVERSION. Fixed strings are optional and can appear more than once in double quotes. A folder name cannot be any character that the target file system does not allow. Examples of pattern are: * ITEMID"-"ITEMREVNAME - This will be evaluated as 00069-Item * ITEMID"_"REVID"_"REVVERSION"_"ITEMREVNAME - This will be evaluated like 00079_A_1_Item
